title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When datetime values are retrieved from a table, they are displayed in different formats in the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
EB: Both the dynamic text item and the data/text item should display datetime values in the same format when retrieved from a table.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Insert a text, data, and dynamic text item.
2. Retrieve datetime values from a table and display them in the text, data, and dynamic text items.
